name: PaintProject_MarcusWashington_Final
description: I created a painting game within Unity that allows users to continuously paint with a variety of objects and colors using the right click and erase using the left click. The users can interact with the game through a series of interfaces that change how the game operates. There are sliders to decide the color, Buttons to change shape and clear canvas (destroy all), and a toggle to decide if the user wants their paint objects to stay. There is also a mouse position indicator in the top right corner of the screen to indicate to the user exactly where their mouse is positioned.
